Name: Velvet Threesome
Ingredients: 20 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
20 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A trio of brandies with a dash of herbal vanilla, rounded with vermouth.
Nutrition: One serving of Velvet Threesome contains 170 calories
